title: Annual Sales Forecast
question_text: The manager of a large supermarket chain would like to forecast annual sales for his stores based on selling space. The Square Footage ( x x ) and the Annual Sales ( y y ) are as follows: Store Square Footage (Thousands) Annual Sales ( Millions) 1 1.5 3.5 2 2.8 4.8 3 2.2 4.2 4 4.5 8.1 5 3.3 5.7 6 1.3 3.2 7 3.4 5.8 8 4.6 8.3 9 1.7 3.8 10 3.1 5.2 Find, a.) the predicted annual sales for a store with 4,000 4,000 square feet of selling space and b.) the coefficient of correlation for this data
